name: just buy $1 worth of this coin
description: $1 is a community-driven cryptocurrency built on the Solana blockchain, with a mission to offset inflation and achieve — and surpass — the value of the US dollar. Powered by collective resilience and strategic growth, $1 aims to create sustainable value and lasting impact within the crypto space. In addition, we boast a brilliant NFT collection that complements our vision and strengthens our community-driven economy and adds utility to our coin.
